ygData.subject: Re: Hangouts for teens
ygData.msgSnippet: There are lot s of options.  But finding a group before 20 isn t so easy now.  You can try any of the Derv camps in Ro, Oasis, the Commons.  Aqua Goblins camps
ygData.messageBody:
There are lot's of options. But finding a group before 20 isn't so
easy now. You can try any of the Derv camps in Ro, Oasis, the
Commons. Aqua Goblins camps in BB are good too. Or you can go to
Highpass and do both Gnolls and Orcs. You can get groups in PC and
that's the happening place for people your level.

EQAtlas is good for maps and guides, but he doesn't update it
anymore. Thank Sony for that.

It's good to see you working on group skills. Too many people solo
so much when they need to group they have no clue what to do.

Tuldayen Grimblade
Pathfinder of Tunare
Terris-Thule, Summoners of the Realm
http://www.magelo.com/eq_view_profile.html?num=761750

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Techpriest" <techpriest@o...>
wrote:
> I am fairly new to EQ and have been trying various class-race
combos to see
> what I like. I now have three character between level 10 and 15.
I have
> been going to Crushbone alot to hunt, and the tower in the field of
bone is
> cool but I am getting tired of the same old stuff. Where else can a
> character in the 10-20 range go to hunt where he can find a group
easily? I
> have looked over the EQ Atlas and see a lot of stuff for 1-10 and
30+.
> Since I may try some more class-race combos before I try and take
anybody
> over 20 I could use some more places to fill the gap between newbie
and
> experienced. I am not interested in power-leveling.
>
> I have EQ Evolution, so every expansion but LDON. I play on the
Tunare
> (sp?) server.
>
> Thanks!
